channel.title: Dialogue please help i will rep++!
channel.description:
Okay i am looking on this code
[code]sendDialogue(player, HAPPY_TALKING, 2244, -1, "Hello, @PLAYER_NAME@ what would you like?");[/code]
Can somebody tell me what means the : [code]2244, -1,[/code]
Please i dont get it what it means

item.title: Dialogue please help i will rep++!
item.dc:creator: @superwiz789 superwiz789
item.description:
@superwiz789 wrote:

[quote=“David321, post:5, topic:432213”][quote author=superwiz789 link=topic=534925.msg3910811#msg3910811 date=1328720821]
2244 - npc id
-1 - next stage of dialogue you want to go to; -1 means there is no more stages

example

[code]
case 1:
sendDialogue(player, HAPPY_TALKING, 2244, 2, “Hello, @PLAYER_NAME@ what would you like?”);
return true;

case 2:
sendDialogue(player, HAPPY_TALKING, 2244, -1, “Goodbye”);
return false;[/code]
[/quote]

ooh but i can set random in -1 place?[/quote]
Nope

Read full topic
item.source: Dialogue please help i will rep++!

item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“David321, post:1, topic:432213”]Okay i am looking on this code

Can somebody tell me what means the :

Please i dont get it what it means[/quote]
2244 is probably the npc id like mentioned above and the -1 could be the type of dialogue? You should try to change both of them and see what changes.
